versos: (spared) Genesis 45:5 - "And now, do not be distressed and do not be angry with yourselves for selling me here, because it was to save lives that God sent me ahead of you.";;;

(run) Isaiah 40:31 - "But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.";;;
(finished) John 19:30 - "When he had received the drink, Jesus said, 'It is finished.' With that, he bowed his head and gave up his spirit.";;;
(joseph) Matthew 1:16 - and Jacob the father of joseph
(hindered) Galatians 5:7 - "You were running a good race. Who cut in on you to keep you from obeying the truth";;;
(going) Isaiah 52:12 - But you will not leave in haste or go in flight; for the Lord will go before you, the God of Israel will be your rear guard.;;;
(write) "write this down for the future so that people who are not yet born will praise the Lord." - Psalm 102:18 CEV;;;
(caught) 1 Corinthians 10:12 - Therefore let anyone who thinks that he stands take heed lest he fall.;;;
(elect) Romans 11:7 - "What then Israel failed to obtain what it was seeking. The elect obtained it, but the rest were hardened,";;;

(twice) Isaiah 40:2 - "Speak tenderly to Jerusalem, and proclaim to her that her hard service has been completed, that her sin has been paid for, that she has received from the Lords hand double for all her sins.";;;
(matters) Philippians 4:9 - "Whatever you have learned or received or heard from me, or seen in meput it into practice. And the God of peace will be with you.";;;

(feareth) Psalm 111:10 - "The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom; all who follow his precepts have good understanding. To him belongs eternal praise.";;;
(needful) Philippians 4:16 - "For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity.";;;
(stephen) Acts 7:55 - "But stephen, full of the Holy Spirit, looked up to heaven and saw the glory of God, and Jesus standing at the right hand of God.";;;
(reproach) Psalm 69:9 - "For zeal for your house consumes me, and the reproaches of those who reproach you have fallen on me.";;;
